message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a unique product that will set you apart from the competition. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe it's a great product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that budget is important, but I'm confident that this product will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $825000. This is a fair price considering the unique features and benefits it offers. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $775000. I'd like to get a better sense of the product's value, and I'm not sure if $825000 is the sweet spot for me. Can you consider this price?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to go below $800000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $795000. This is as low as I can go without compromising the value of the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above $795000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $780000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations we've had so far. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're still not satisfied with the price, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $795000. I'm willing to make a small adjustment and offer it to you for $790000. This is the lowest price I can offer without compromising the value of the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $790000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $780000 and $790000, so I'm offering $785000. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're still trying to find the right price, Bob, but I'm not willing to go above $790000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $785000 and $790000, so I'm offering $787500. This is the highest price I can offer without compromising the value of the product. What do you think?

I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $787500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $785000 and $787500, so I'm offering $786250. I think this is a fair price considering our negotiations so far. Can you consider this price?
